EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to Patient Community users when they Change Password
EmailTemplate.name: Patient Community Changed Password
EmailTemplate.subject: Your password reset for {!Community_Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Your password has been reset for {!Community_Name}. Go to:
{!Community_Url}
sgkencrypt Warmly, Susan G. Komen
This message was sent to {!Account.PersonEmail} For breast health or breast cancer information, please call the Breast Care Helpline: 1-877 GO KOMEN (1-877-465-6636) | helpline@komen.org
